邀.definition: to invite; to request; to intercept; to solicit; to seek

邀功.definition: to take the credit for sb's achievement

邀宴.definition: to invite sb to a banquet

邀擊.definition: to intercept; to waylay; to ambush

邀請賽.definition: invitation tournament (e.g. between schools or firms)

邀買人心.definition: to buy popular support; to court favor

邀集.definition: to invite a group of people (to assemble for a gathering)
